description: Slimphoria™ Tracker is a simple, easy to use diet tracking application that allows you to track your daily calorie, carbohydrate (carb) and fat intake. Slimphoria™ Tracker saves each individual meal into a fully featured database that allows you to go back and see the history of any meal you've entered into the system. You can run reports to easily view your dieting progress and weight loss. Carbohydrates are the key to maintaining healthy blood sugar levels for those with diabetes. The carb tracking ability makes this app especially useful to diabetics or low carb dieters on Atkins or South Beach diets who wish to keep track of carbohydrate intake. The daily calorie and fat totals are a must have for any diet. The reporting options allow you to select a range of dates to view your weight loss history, daily nutritional intake or even run a simple comparison report to see how you've progressed. The three available reports are the Intake Report which shows your caloric/carb/fat consumption, Weight Report which shows you your weight loss progress and Comparison Report to show how 2 dates compare. If you want an easy way to keep track of your dietary intake or just want a tool to keep you motivated then Slimphoria™ Tracker is right for you!
